title: Incredible Hogwarts crest cake goes on sale as Asda launch Harry Potter range
text:

Whether you're an ambitious Slytherin, brave Gryffindor, intelligent Ravenclaw or hardworking Hufflepuff, you can now show your allegiance to your beloved Hogwarts house in bakery form.

As Asda are launching dreamy Harry Potter cupcakes, each one emblazoned with a different house crest.

Combining light sponge with frosting and edible crest decorations, they come in a pack of twelve, with three cupcakes for each Hogwarts house.

Setting you back £7 for the full 12-pack platter of individual Hogwarts house crest cupcakes, the sleeve of the platter also transforms into a corner bookmark marked with a different house crest - perfect for all those avid Harry Potter readers who want to keep re-reading them again and again.

If you want something a little larger, the same range also includes Harry Potter gift cakes for £4, each one bearing a different house crest.

But the most impressive one of them all is surely the £12 celebration cake: a Hogwarts crest-shaped chocolate sponge cake with chocolate filling that's been hand-decorated and finished with a bronze sheen reminiscent of a Quidditch Snitch.

Set to launch in Asda stores from next Monday (14th October), they're ideal for birthdays, baby showers or just a Friday night, and we can't wait to see which house sells out first...

Talking about the launch, Finsbury food group - the bakery manufacturer behind the creative cakes, said “Harry Potter is loved and enjoyed by people of all ages and we’ve created the perfect range of celebration cakes, thinking of something for everyone – no matter what Hogwarts House you are in!” said Jordan McCann, Junior Brand Manager at Finsbury Food Group.

“We’ve made sure the range includes celebration cakes that can be showstopping centrepieces, to gift cakes that you are proud to present to your friends and family!”
description: There's a cupcakes platter and full cakes - each featuring Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw and Hufflepuff
